Scene:
The Double Suicide
(Michiyuki shimoyo no sennichi / 道行霜夜の千日)

Play: A Tragic Love Triangle (艶容女舞衣)

Production: January 1972

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Shimatayū VIII (豊竹嶋大夫 (八))

Toyotake Matsukadayū (豊竹松香大夫)

Takemoto Midoridayū (竹本緑大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Dōhachi II (see also Tsuruzawa Tokutarō) (鶴沢道八 (二))

Takezawa Danroku VIII (see also Tsuruzawa Kanji VII) (竹沢団六 (八))

Tsuruzawa Seiji (鶴澤清治)



Performers:

Puppeteer Character Kashira
Yoshida Bunjaku
(吉田文雀) 		Sankatsu
(美濃屋三勝) 		Musume
(娘)
